data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kataev, Boris M. (2019): A review of the Afrotropical genus Kenyacus (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Harpalini) from the Rwenzori Mountains, with description of seven new species. Zootaxa 4679 (3): 463-498, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4679.3.3|31 occurrences
